description: File containing definitions and configuration for prune plugin

Prune.description: Configuration for prune plugin. Please make sure to install the [serverless-prune-plugin](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-prune-plugin) package and add to plugins

automatic.description: Weather to prune automatically on deploy or not

number.description: The number of versions to keep.  It is possible to set number to 0. In this case, the plugin will delete all the function versions (except $LATEST); this is useful when disabling function versioning for an already-deployed stack.

includeLayers.description: Whether to prune versions of layers or not
